p: Podisus nigrispinus tolerates lemongrass essential oil and its constituents, but geranyl acetate repelled this predator and citral caused irritability. This suggests caution in the use of lemongrass essential oil and these constituents in integrated pest management involving P. nigrispinus. This study may support future research with Cymbopogon citratus and its constituents in the search for bioinsecticides, based on nanoscience, against pests but without effect on this predator.
